text: ( Source : OPEC - Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries) Vienna, Austria , 22 October 2015--The price of OPEC basket of twelve crudes stood at 43.67 dollars a barrel on Wednesday, compared with $43.87 the previous day, according to
